mapper.select: select pe_id, pe_name, substring_index(pe_image, ',', 1) as pe_image from pest order by pe_id desc
select pe_id, pe_name, substring_index(pe_image, ',', 1) as pe_image from pest order by pe_hits desc limit 3;
select pe_id, ec_id, pe_name, pe_image, pe_cause, pe_method, pe_biologicalControl, pe_naturalEnemy, pe_carefulPlant, pe_description, pe_hits from pest where pe_id = #{pe_id}
select pe_id, pe_name, substring_index(pe_image, ',', 1) as pe_image from pest where pe_name like CONCAT('%', #{searchword}, '%')
mapper.insert: insert into pest (pe_id, ec_id, pe_name, pe_image, pe_cause, pe_method, pe_biologicalControl, pe_naturalEnemy, pe_carefulPlant, pe_description, pe_hits) values (#{pe_id}, 30, #{pe_name}, #{pe_image}, #{pe_cause}, #{pe_method}, #{pe_biologicalControl}, #{pe_naturalEnemy}, #{pe_carefulPlant}, #{pe_description}, 0)
